statements: SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS user_count FROM users WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM users WHERE password = 'secure123';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username, password_hash FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, role FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.id = r.user_id WHERE u.id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM UserAccounts;
SELECT username FROM UserAccounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM UserRoleMapping WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM UserRoles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM UserRoleMapping JOIN UserAccounts ON UserRoleMapping.user_id = UserAccounts.user_id JOIN UserRoles ON UserRoleMapping.role_id = UserRoles.role_id;

SELECT username FROM UserAccounts WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM UserAccounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT role_name FROM UserRoles;
SELECT ua.user_id, ua.username, ur.role_name FROM UserAccounts ua JOIN UserRoleMapping urm ON ua.user_id = urm.user_id JOIN UserRoles ur ON urm.role_id = ur.role_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE r.role_name = 'ADMIN';
